reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Capacity building in cities in East China, to help China's industrial upgrade and sustainable economic growth

description.narrative: The project is designed to support China's industrial upgrade and the sustainability of China's economic model. It intends to do this through new strategic collaborations between six cites in the Midlands (through the Midlands ‘Engine for Growth') and cities in East China. These collaborations will be in areas such as automotives, healthcare, creativity, financial services, education and manufacturing and are expected to generate opportunities for international businesses, including from the UK.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
